verses.verse: The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> was upon me, and carried me <S%H3318>out<s%> in the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, and set me <S%H5117>down<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H1237>valley<s%> which was <S%H4392>full<s%> of <S%H6106>bones<s%>,

And caused me to <S%H5674>pass<s%> by them round <S%H5439>about<s%>: and, behold, there were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7227>many<s%> in the <S%H6440>open<s%> <S%H1237>valley<s%>; and, lo, they were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3002>dry<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, can these <S%H6106>bones<s%> <S%H2421>live<s%>? And I <S%H559>answered<s%>, O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>, thou <S%H3045>knowest<s%>.

Again he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> upon these <S%H6106>bones<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, O ye <S%H3002>dry<s%> <S%H6106>bones<s%>, <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%> unto these <S%H6106>bones<s%>; Behold, I will cause <S%H7307>breath<s%> to <S%H935>enter<s%> into you, and ye shall <S%H2421>live<s%>:

And I will <S%H5414>lay<s%> <S%H1517>sinews<s%> upon you, and will bring <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H1320>flesh<s%> upon you, and <S%H7159>cover<s%> you with <S%H5785>skin<s%>, and <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H7307>breath<s%> in you, and ye shall <S%H2421>live<s%>; and ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as I was <S%H6680>commanded<s%>: and as I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%>, there was a <S%H6963>noise<s%>, and behold a <S%H7494>shaking<s%>, and the <S%H6106>bones<s%> came <S%H7126>together<s%>, <S%H6106>bone<s%> to his <S%H6106>bone<s%>.

And when I <S%H7200>beheld<s%>, lo, the <S%H1517>sinews<s%> and the <S%H1320>flesh<s%> came <S%H5927>up<s%> upon them, and the <S%H5785>skin<s%> <S%H7159>covered<s%> them <S%H4605>above<s%>: but there was no <S%H7307>breath<s%> in them.

Then <S%H559>said<s%> he unto me, <S%H5012>Prophesy<s%> unto the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, <S%H5012>prophesy<s%>, <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> to the <S%H7307>wind<s%>, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; <S%H935>Come<s%> from the <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H7307>winds<s%>, O <S%H7307>breath<s%>, and <S%H5301>breathe<s%> upon these <S%H2026>slain<s%>, that they may <S%H2421>live<s%>.

So I <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> me, and the <S%H7307>breath<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> into them, and they <S%H2421>lived<s%>, and stood <S%H5975>up<s%> upon their <S%H7272>feet<s%>, an <S%H3966%H3966>exceeding<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2428>army<s%>.

¶ Then he <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, these <S%H6106>bones<s%> are the whole <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>: behold, they <S%H559>say<s%>, Our <S%H6106>bones<s%> are <S%H3001>dried<s%>, and our <S%H8615>hope<s%> is <S%H6>lost<s%>: we are cut <S%H1504>off<s%> for our parts.

Therefore <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, I will <S%H6605>open<s%> your <S%H6913>graves<s%>, and cause you to come <S%H5927>up<s%> out of your <S%H6913>graves<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> you into the <S%H127>land<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>.

And ye shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I am the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>, when I have <S%H6605>opened<s%> your <S%H6913>graves<s%>, O my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and brought you <S%H5927>up<s%> out of your <S%H6913>graves<s%>,

And shall <S%H5414>put<s%> my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> in you, and ye shall <S%H2421>live<s%>, and I shall <S%H3240>place<s%> you in your own <S%H127>land<s%>: then shall ye <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> it, and <S%H6213>performed<s%> it, <S%H5002>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>.
¶ The <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> came again unto me, <S%H559>saying<s%>,

Moreover, thou <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> thee <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>, and <S%H3789>write<s%> upon it, For <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions<s%>: then <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>, and <S%H3789>write<s%> upon it, For <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and for all the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>companions<s%>:
And <S%H7126>join<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> to <S%H259>another<s%> into <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>; and they shall become <S%H259>one<s%> in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
¶ And when the <S%H1121>children<s%> of thy <S%H5971>people<s%> shall <S%H559>speak<s%> unto thee, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Wilt thou not <S%H5046>shew<s%> us what thou meanest by these?

<S%H1696>Say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, which is in the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%>, and the <S%H7626>tribes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> his <S%H2270>fellows<s%>, and will <S%H5414>put<s%> them with him, even with the <S%H6086>stick<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6086>stick<s%>, and they shall be <S%H259>one<s%> in mine <S%H3027>hand<s%>.
¶ And the <S%H6086>sticks<s%> whereon thou <S%H3789>writest<s%> shall be in thine <S%H3027>hand<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes<s%>.

And <S%H1696>say<s%> unto them, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>GOD<s%>; Behold, I will <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> from <S%H996>among<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%>, whither they be <S%H1980>gone<s%>, and will <S%H6908>gather<s%> them on every <S%H5439>side<s%>, and <S%H935>bring<s%> them into their own <S%H127>land<s%>:

And I will <S%H6213>make<s%> them <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> upon the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>; and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> to them all: and they shall <S%H5750>be<s%> no more <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%>, neither shall they be <S%H2673>divided<s%> into <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> any more at all:

Neither shall they <S%H2930>defile<s%> themselves any more with their <S%H1544>idols<s%>, nor with their detestable <S%H8251>things<s%>, nor with any of their <S%H6588>transgressions<s%>: but I will <S%H3467>save<s%> them out of all their <S%H4186>dwellingplaces<s%>, wherein they have <S%H2398>sinned<s%>, and will <S%H2891>cleanse<s%> them: so shall they be my <S%H5971>people<s%>, and I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> over them; and they all shall have <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H7462>shepherd<s%>: they shall also <S%H3212>walk<s%> in my <S%H4941>judgments<s%>, and <S%H8104>observe<s%> my <S%H2708>statutes<s%>, and <S%H6213>do<s%> them.

And they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> that I have <S%H5414>given<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> my <S%H5650>servant<s%>, wherein your <S%H1>fathers<s%> have <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>; and they shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> therein, even they, and their <S%H1121>children<s%>, and their <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> for <S%H5769>ever<s%>: and my <S%H5650>servant<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be their <S%H5387>prince<s%> <S%H5704>for<s%> <S%H5769>ever<s%>.

Moreover I will <S%H3772>make<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> of <S%H7965>peace<s%> with them; it shall be an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with them: and I will <S%H5414>place<s%> them, and <S%H7235>multiply<s%> them, and will <S%H5414>set<s%> my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
My <S%H4908>tabernacle<s%> also shall be with them: yea, I will be their <S%H430>God<s%>, and they shall be my <S%H5971>people<s%>.

And the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> shall <S%H3045>know<s%> that I the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> do <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, when my <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> shall be in the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of them for <S%H5769>evermore<s%>.
